title: [ ALE ] Autumn leaf Esports. Recruiting players for OOL and further.
body:
Hey guys, Autumn Leaf Esports is recruiting players who want to strive to be the best, who have team work and communication, players who talk about problems they see and players who don't get offended by constructive criticism.

I am looking for high elo players, pref around diamond elo to start a team. i will be in need of 5 players as i won't be playing but managing it. 

There will be a timetable of playing days/times,scrims, what to practice as a team, champ pools, team comps and so on from there

this team will be going into OOL and hopefully going further from there, a lot of time and effort and coordination will be needed to make this a success. 

I would like to pick up a coach and someone that can help build this team/organization.

This is a new team, that means new chapters to be made. 

I would like players who do put an application to be able to make times/scrims. 

Ign:
Champ pool:
Elo: 
Weakness:
Strengths: 
Times you can play:

replies.body:
Ign: Corpse Collector
Champ pool:  Swain, lux,fiddle bleech, Yi, Natutilus, Sejuani Normally I pref top and mid and supp.
Elo: Diamond 4
Weakness: None.
Strengths: Send alots of time for practice .most of time accecpt team mate opinions and good communicate skills.
Times you can play: Any time.

Ign: hyperkiller100
Champ pool: Jayce, Nautilus, Renekton, Trundle, Darius, Poppy Will be learning more as i play around with champs to see what feels good.
Elo: Diamond 5
Weakness: Mid game csing, when to roam from lane, can't seem to carry games, not 100% sure when to use tp sometimes.
Strengths: Willing to learn, will listen and practice anything suggested to me. Some competitive experience in HSL.
Times you can play: 5pm-12am Weekdays, Weekends are pretty much all day.

Ign: Beetletank

Champ pool: Reksai, Skarner, Sejuani, Hecarim, Ivern, Xin Zhao

Elo: Diamond 5

Weakness: Shotcalling, gets tilted a bit if I get a bit behind by making silly mistakes or dying for no reason

Strengths: Decent mechanics, am a resilient and humble person whose willing to learn from criticism/mistakes.

Times you can play: My work has a rotating roster so I either work morning shift or afternoon shift. If I'm on morning shift that week I will be free at night times in the weekdays but if I'm on afternoon shift that week, I'll be on pretty late on week nights.
Saturdays I can pretty much play all day and Sunday I can play at nights times usually.

IGN: MirthrilKing

Champ Pool: Rakan, Taric, Braum, Tahm Kench, Thresh basically any support

Elo: Diamond 2

Weaknesses: Playing from behind, will run away with a game if given a slight lead but I can't stand playing from a losing position also has to work on laning phase

Strengths: Teamfighting and small skirmishes is where I show off most of my prowess as well as being a pretty chill person all around and easy to get along with.

Time I can play: Currently I am available every single evening and all day on the weekends. Once I get my uni schedule I can offer more full days and probably mornings as well depending where timeslots fall.

**Ign:** Gnarmy of One

**Champ pool:** Xayah, Tristana, Twitch and Kog'maw

**Elo:** Diamond 4 (Currently)

**Weakness:** Positioning in team fights and trusting my instincts but I am improving

**Strengths:** Strong communication, Willing to help others learn and be learned by coaches/managers and etc. I am confident in the fact that I can adapt to any situation and can help my team achieve victory.

**Times you can play:** Every day (No job at the moment) and I mean every day unless a family event pops up

Also if you'd like to see me first hand or would like to watch old VODS of mine my twitch is https://www.twitch.tv/maddawgaether

Ign: Zeo

Champ pool: Vladimir, Anivia, Ahri, Ryze, Orianna, Viktor, 

Elo: Diamond 4 Solo, Challenger Flex

Weakness: Can be vulnerable to ganks, 

Strengths: Aggressive play style, Decent mechanics, Willing to learn, Drive to win, Competitive experience (HSL, Previous OOL teams)

Times you can play: Monday-Friday (5-10PM) Saturday-Sunday (Likely the whole day) (NZST)
